text:
At café "Le Moment" nestled in the corner of the city,
the new hotcakes on the menu seem to be highly rated...
But, there seems to be some ominous signs──
I should have brought an umbrella...

Um... if you don't mind...
Please take the café's umbrella...

Oh, thank you!
But I'm okay!

Instead... can I get another cup?
I might be staying a bit longer.

Man, it's raining so much...
My jacket's soaking wet...

Oh...!
I'll bring you... a towel...!

Ahaha, so I'm not the only one taking shelter from the ra──
! ...Wait, you're the one from the other day...!
Aren't you the one I bumped into the other day?

...The café's about to be closed soon, righht?
Hmm... Should I make a break for it?
Hey, how about we head out together?

Um...
Can I still borrow the café's umbrella?

Yes, of course...
I'll go get it...

Thank you!
...The umbrella should be enough for us both.
If it's big enough... then yeah, let's go.
